about_the_game:
Synopsis
A scifi third person survival horror. Stranded in the farthest reaches of space, Dr. Belica Gale boards the Opaldune seeking help. But in the bowels of the ship, monsters are prowling. Slip through dark hallways to scavenge for supplies, solve puzzles, and evade enemies long enough to get back out.

Gameplay features
Opaldune is a sci-fi survival horror third person shooter game tempered with puzzle solving.

- Realistic and custom models developed for the main character and the enemies
- Gorgeous heroine, Belica
- Enemies that adapt to your play style and strategize on taking you out
- Ammo/Resource conservation
- Saferoom accessibility management
- Set in an isolated space station
- Different items that can be used
- Different types of zombies with different characteristics

Development Team
Opaldune is a game developed with all the love and attention of 4 core members Gavin, Lip, @Saturne and Wilson. We hope from the bottom of our hearts that this short game will bring you some amount of happiness. The game is still work in progress so if anything comes up, we are just a buzz away on our Discord.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 670 / GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-13700 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD RX VEGA 56
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
